Main_Party_Desc: Elemental Resonance and Character Weapon System
Novice_Finish: Novice Wishes is finished. Click Reset or Wish × 10 button
If_Inventory_Blank: There is no item in inventory... Click Wish × 10 button!
Help_Warning: This is just fun! Don't be serious.
Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
MartialArtist_TwoPieceSet: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%
RetracingBolide_TwoPieceSet: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
Instructor_FourPieceSet: After causing an elemental reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s
Berserker_FourPieceSet: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%
TheExile_FourPieceSet: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack
ResolutionOfSojourner_FourPieceSet: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%
MartialArtist_FourPieceSet: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s
DefenderOfWill_FourPieceSet: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party
TinyMiracle_FourPieceSet: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s
BraveHeart_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP
Gambler_FourPieceSet: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
Scholar_FourPieceSet: Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s
GladiatorOfFinaleFinale_FourPieceSet: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%
MaidenBeloved_FourPieceSet: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s
NoblesseOblige_FourPieceSet: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack
BloodstainedChivalry_FourPieceSet: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s
WandererOfTroupe_FourPieceSet: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow
ViridescentVenerer_FourPieceSet: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s
ThunderingFury_FourPieceSet: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s
Thundersoother_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%
CrimsonWitchOfFlames_FourPieceSet: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks
Lavawalker_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%
ArchaicPetra_FourPieceSet: Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% Elemental DMG Bonus to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time
RetracingBolide_FourPieceSet: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield
Fire_Of_Passion: 얼음 원소의 부착 지속 시간이 40% 감소한다. 공격력이 25% 증가한다.
Healing_Water: 불 원소의 부착 지속 시간이 40% 감소한다. 받는 치유 효과가 30% 증가한다.
Swift_Wind: 스태미나 소모량이 15% 감소하고 이동 속도가 10% 상승하며, 스킬 재사용 대기시간이 5% 감소한다.
Energetic_Lightning:
물 원소의 부착 지속 시간이 40% 감소한다. 초전도, 과부하, 감전 반응을 일으키면 100%의 확률로 번개 원소 입자가 1개 생성된다.
재사용 대기시간: 5초
Crushing_Ice: 번개 원소의 부착 지속 시간이 40% 감소한다. 얼음 원소가 부착됐거나 빙결 상태인 적을 공격할 때 치명타 확률이 15% 증가한다.
Floating_Rock: 경직 저항력이 상승한다. 보호막 존재 시 가하는 피해가 15% 증가한다.
